content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28, -61) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace (position -27, -59)
- Burner inserter (position -25.5, -58.5) 
- Wooden chest (position -24.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Processing Complex at (-10, -59)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills in a row (positions -10/-59, -8/-59, -6/-59) mining iron ore
- Multiple wooden chests collecting ore (positions -9.5/-57.5, -7.5/-57.5, -5.5/-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow between components
- Transport belt system connecting the mining area
- Storage chests containing processed iron ore and plates

### Smelting Array at (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces in a row (positions 0/0, 2/0, 4/0, 6/0)
- Input wooden chests (positions 0.5/-2.5, 2.5/-2.5, 4.5/-2.5, 6.5/-2.5)
- Output wooden chests (positions 0.5/2.5, 2.5/2.5, 4.5/2.5, 6.5/2.5)
- Burner inserters managing input (positions 0.5/-1.5, 2.5/-1.5, 4.5/-1.5, 6.5/-1.5)
- Burner inserters managing output (positions 0.5/1.5, 2.5/1.5, 4.5/1.5, 6.5/1.5)

### Belt Transport System
- Two major belt groups connecting mining and processing areas
- First group: From (-9.5, -54.5) to (0.5, -4.5)
- Second group: From (-6.5, -54.5) to (-4.5, -54.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collision Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Ensure target placement location is clear of other entities
- When placing entities next to each other, verify there is enough space between them
- Consider using different spacing or direction if initial placement fails

### Output Blocking Issues
- Ensure there is a valid output destination (chest, belt, etc.) before items are produced
- Place appropriate collection entities at drop positions to prevent items blocking output
- Verify the entire production chain has proper item flow paths

### Resource Management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure consistent material flow between processing stages
- Set up proper input/output connections for all production entities
